system.description: As you release your spiritual artifact it splits into numerous mirrored images. You add the spell @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.05w9nzp0kvu94k3h]{Mirror Image} to your list of known wielder spells. In addition, when you animate your bonded artifact using your spiritual artifact feature, you may choose to cast the spell mirror image on your bonded artifact at 2nd level without expending any additional artifact charges as a part of the same bonus action. Spells you cast in this way are treated as if your bonded artifact cast them on itself.
